title: 2 Simple Ways to Change Your Google Voice Phone Number

steps.title: Go to https://voice.google.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://voice.google.com in a web browser. To get a new Google Voice phone number, you'll need to delete your current number and register for a new one . If you aren't already logged into your Google account , do so now. Before you delete your number, make sure it's not linked to any important services or accounts.

steps.title: Click the cog icon.
steps.content: Click the cog icon. This is in the top-right corner of the Google Voice homepage. A new page will open.

steps.title: Click Account.
steps.content: Click Account . This is the tab on the left.

steps.title: Click Delete.
steps.content: Click Delete . You can find this underneath your current Google Voice phone number.

steps.title: Click Delete number.
steps.content: Click Delete number . This will confirm your decision. Once the number is deleted, you can sign up for a new Google Voice number.

steps.title: Click Get a number.
steps.content: Click Get a number . You can find this button where the previous Delete button was.

steps.title: Enter your city or area code.
steps.content: Enter your city or area code. This will help Google recommend available numbers in your area.

steps.title: Click Select next to the number you want.
steps.content: Click Select next to the number you want. If you don't like any of the available numbers, just return to the settings menu and click Get a number again. Then, enter the same city or area code to see a new list of Google Voice numbers.

steps.title: Click Verify.
steps.content: Click Verify . This is the green button. You must provide your mobile phone number to use Google Voice.

steps.title: Click Send code to send a verification text.
steps.content: Click Send code to send a verification text. Google Voice will send a text message to the provided phone number. It can take a few seconds or a few minutes to receive the verification text. If you didn't get the code, click Resend code to try again.

steps.title: Enter the code and click Verify.
steps.content: Enter the code and click Verify . This should be a 6-digit code.

steps.title: Click Claim.
steps.content: Click Claim . This will confirm your new Google Voice number. You can now use your new Google Voice phone number to make phone calls and send texts with Google Voice.

steps.title: Go to https://voice.google.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://voice.google.com in a web browser. Use this method if you want to transfer your existing Google Voice phone number to a different Google account. Keep in mind this will only transfer the number, not the call history or voicemails. [1] X Research source If you aren't already logged into your Google account, do so now. You can only transfer a Google Voice phone number once every 4 months.

steps.title: Click the cog icon.
steps.content: Click the cog icon. This is in the top-right corner of the Google Voice homepage. A new page will open.

steps.title: Click Account.
steps.content: Click Account . This is the tab on the left.

steps.title: Click Transfer a number.
steps.content: Click Transfer a number . This is in the Transfer your number to another Voice account section. Follow the prompts to confirm your decision.

steps.title: Accept the transfer.
steps.content: Accept the transfer. Log into Google Voice with the new account. Click the cog icon. Click Account . Click Accept in the Transfer your number section.
